reviewText: These Disney VHS cartoons were released in the 1980s, and I fondly remember renting the series many times from the local video shop.  This particular tape is focused on Minnie and the gang. An excellent collection, which hopefully Disney will release on DVD along with the others in the Cartoon Classics series. Until then, look for used VHS tapes in the Amazon Marketplace and auction sites.

Includes three of Minnies adventures with Figaro of "Pinocchio" fame! Introduced by Rare Film footage of Walt Disney-only on these Limited Gold Edition programs. Minnie still enjoys one of the longest-running romances in movie history with her famous co-star Mickey. Minnie made her cartoon debut along with Mickey in 1928 and has been at his side ever since, through over half-century of uncomplicated affection and hilarious adventure. The Limited Gold Edition program also features Minnie in three great cartoons, with Figaro the kitten, who zoomed to stardom following his captivating performance in Disney's animated classic, Pinocchio. Titles: Plane Crazy, Mickey's Rival, First Aiders, The Nifty Nineties, Bath Day, Mickey's Delayed Date, and Figaro and Frankie
